newInstance()

newInstance(string $key, array $tokens_values)

Returns a new Exception instance.

Parameters

string $key

The type of exception to return; e.g., 'ERR_OPTION_NOT_DEFINED'.
array $tokens_values

Translation placeholder tokens and their replacement values.
